adDetails: Freelance composer songwriter available for hire. Will consider spec gigs for stipend plus licensing fee. Willing to work within your budget if possible. Currently composing music for Independent Films in San Francisco Bay Area IMDB credit included TriBeCa music festival included Samples at: http://www.reverbnation.com/soundtracksound Other samples upon request. Including Jingles and Songs. Easy to work with, reliable and fast turnaround time. Please contact me for rates and/or collaboration. Thank you, Larry Tasse
